channel.title: Scout - monitoring
channel.description:
Have been testing out a bunch of monitoring solutions and came across [Scout][1], lightweight, simple plugin architecture, sane API AND their support is good. Think it a good option for those of use with a smallish infrastructure. Still early days but I'm impressed so far.
[1]: http://www.scoutapp.com
